definition.content:
## Overview
- This dashboard gives insights about threat related logs.
- Threat logs display entries when traffic matches one of the Security Profiles attached to a security rule on the firewall.

## Widgets
1. Total Threat Events
2. Threat Events Overtime
3. Action Distribution
4. Severity Distribution
5. Attacks Direction
6. Threat Categories Distribution
7. Top Source Users
8. Top Destination Users
9. Top Sources
10. Top Destinations
11. Top Senders
12. Top Recipients
13. Source Zone Distribution
14. Destination Zone Distribution
15. Top URL/Files
16. Top File Types
17. Tunnel Type Distribution 
18. Top Flags
19. Protocol Distribution
20. Top App Categories
21. Top Threat IDs
22. Top Rules
23. Top HTTP methods
24. Top Subtype Categories
25. Top URL Categories
26. App Details with Risk
27. Proxy Types
28. Log Details
